text: Digau Israel gu hagatanga mai gi daha mo di Gonduu Hor, e hula i di ala dela e hana gi di Malua o Aqaba21.4 Di ingoo di tai deenei i nnelekai Hebrew go Yam Suph dono hadinga bolo di Tai o nia Aalek, ga haganiga tenua go Edom, gei nia daangada gu hagalee manawa hagakono ang gi nadau haingadaa.21.4 Deuteronomy 2.1
